products.name: Freestyle Libre Sensor Flash Glucose Monitoring System
products.description: The FreeStyle Libre sensor continuously measures your glucose levels, day and night, without the need for finger pricking . This small, discreet and water-resistant2 sensor is worn on the back of your upper arm and lasts for up to 14 days whilst you shower, bathe, swim, exercise or play.
